mangala samarawira pitaman kirimen da, chandrika bandaranayaka pakshayen panna damamin da, ejapaye salakiya yuthu pirisak dath shakthimath kara ganimata lan kara ganimen da, siyalu prathiwadin naththatama nathi kara damamin da, awashya sama kenekuma thamanta hila kara ganimin da, amathyawarun athulu siyalu tharathiramwala mahajana niyojithayan niwatayan bawata path kara ganimin da, sarath fonseka siragatha karamin da, shirani bandaranayaka awalangu kasiyak bawata path karamin da, siyalu ana panath wyawastha sashodhana thani kamaththata sammatha kara ganimata parlimenthuwa montisoriyak bawata path karamin da, rate jiwath wiya yuthu nathi pudgalayan lesa salaku pudgalayanta awashya piyawara ganimin da, rajya palanaya kala andama gana athambaula se danna wimal wirawanshata sabawinma me aanduwa wada bari aanduwak bawa watahima niwaradiya.

pilipina reman magsese sammanaya(2001), indiyanu padma shri sammanaya saha shri lankawe kalakirthi janadhipathi sammanaya (1986), menma deshamanya sammanaya(1998) aadi sammana rasak dina ganimatada amaradewa samath weyi.emenma 1967, yunesko manila simposiyama saha, "gawumi salam" nam wu maladiwayin jathika giya sadaha 1972 di brithanys elisabeth rajinage aaradhanayen yuthuwa thanuwa nirmanayata dayaka wima aadiyen, ohu jathyantharaya thula lankeya ananyathawa salakota sitiyeya.
